Just tried the @Citymapper Siri action. Once set up, no need to take the phone out. Press button on headphones to activate Siri, speak the word, get the next buses arriving spoken straight to the headphones. 👍 #superpower #ios12 https://t.co/AwfeLE4mQO

Siri shortcuts might well be the biggest step in extending iOS functionality ever. https://t.co/9yIOf5exbx

Also with voice commands, AirPods move past earphone, and become Audio Augmented reality.
Arrive at a bus stop, touch it, say “departures”, and you hear when the buses are coming. Proper superpower. https://t.co/VI3J685vJK
Voice commands run very deep in culture. It’s basically magic spells made real. Extra point to the first flashlight app developer that suggest “lumos” as its shortcut. https://t.co/VI3J685vJK
